title: Administrative Officer Job at Divine Infinity College
content:
At Divine Infinity College, we deliver a broad and balanced curriculum to explore knowledge, nourish creativity, and encourage independence. Our focus is to bring out the best in every child. We run both Nigerian and British Curriculum, and our learners are coached for WAEC, JAMB, and IGCSE.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer
Job Location: Okota / Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proactive and organised Administrative Officer to provide essential administrative support to our team.
	This role ensures the office runs efficiently and supports day-to-day operations.


Key Responsibilities
Administrative Support:


	Prepare and maintain reports, spreadsheets, and documents.
	Manage office supplies and order when necessary.
	Assist with data entry, filing, and record-keeping.
	Schedule meetings and maintain team calendars.
	Provide general support to ensure smooth office operations.


What We’re Looking For


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications in a related field.
	Previous experience in an admin role is desirable.
	Strong organisational and time-management skills.
	Good attention to detail and accuracy.
	Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).
	Ability to handle confidential information professionally.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: amosandreww@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
